column4: Tesla shedding jobs in China as sales target missed
column5: BEIJING High-end electric vehicle maker Tesla Motors Inc  on Monday said it is cutting jobs in China under a restructuring plan launched earlier this year  after missing a sales target in the world's biggest car market.

column4: Tesla shedding jobs in China as sales target missed
column5: BEIJING  March 9 High-end electric vehicle maker Tesla Motors Inc on Monday said it is cutting jobs in China under a restructuring plan launched earlier this year  after missing a sales target in the world's biggest car market.

column4: Qualcomm to buy back up to $15 bln of shares  raise dividend
column5: Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc said it would buy back up to $15 billion of shares and raise its quarterly dividend.

column4: UPDATE 1-Qualcomm to buy back up to $15 bln of shares  raise dividend
column5: March 9 Chipmaker Qualcomm Inc said it would buy back up to $15 billion of shares and raise its quarterly dividend.
